author: Lindsay Steele
title: Orange Avocado Salad
ingredients: 2 Tablespoons Balsamic vinegar (Iâ€™m using @bakerandolive peach balsamic for extra sweetness and flavor)
3 oz. Arugula (or a few big handfuls)
instructions_list: In a large bowl, combine the olive oil, vinegar, mustard, salt and pepper. Mix together.
In a skillet, toast pine nuts.
To the bowl, add the diced cucumber, red onion, avocado, orange, pine nuts, goat cheese and arugula. Toss into the dressing at the bottom of the bowl.
description: A delicious combination of oranges, avocado, and goat cheese served over arugula and tossed with a balsamic vinaigrette.
